import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Sheet from 'react-modal-sheet'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, Button, Container, CardHeader, Media, PopoverBody, PopoverHeader, InputGroupAddon, Input, InputGroup, Popover } from 'reactstrap'; import "./styles.css"; import helpers from "../misc/index.js"; import moment from "moment"; import ReactPlayer from 'react-player'; import { MoreVertical } from "react-feather"; import one from '../../../../../../../assets/images/job-search/1.jpg'; import two from '../../../../../../../assets/images/job-search/6.jpg'; import timeline1 from "../../../../../../../assets/images/social-app/timeline-1.png"; const { renderProfilePicVideoPost } = helpers; // Main function for this file is at/near the very bottom of this file... it's called const renderGridImageOrVideo = (file) => { if (file.type.includes("video")) { // video logic return ( ); } else if (file.type.includes("image")) { // image logic return (
); } else { console.log("NEITHER MATCH.") } } const ViewPostFileContentHelper = ({ selectedPost, isPostPaneOpen, setPostPaneOpenState, user, userData }) => { const handleRespondEmoji = (reaction) => { console.log("handleRespondEmoji clicked/run...:", reaction); } return ( setPostPaneOpenState(false)}>
Comment, React & Participate in this post's other comment's & active participants. You can post comments & react to this post and/or comments from this current pane/slider...
